bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Condition of various types that have continuous seepage of liquid as their common sign.a) Identical with lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores; fistula. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 50: 時發寒熱，仍膿血不止，謂之漏也 , “At times [patients] develop alternating sensations of cold and heat. This goes along with unending festering and bleeding. One calls this ‘ leakage ’”.b) Identical with lou jing 漏精 , leaking essence/semen. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren gui 人傀：漏者，精寒不固，常自遺泄也 , “In the case of ‘ leakage ’, one’s essence/semen is cold and unstable. It often flows offspontaneously”.c) Identical with lou xia 漏下 , “leaking discharge”. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 38: 血非時而下，淋瀝不斷，謂之漏 , “When blood flows down any time, and when there is continuous dripping, this is called ‘ leakage ’.d) Later stage in the development of zhi chuang 痔瘡 , piles sores, with recurrent bleeding over an extended period of time as a major sign. Dan xi xin fa Book on clinical medicine. Ming era, 丹溪心法 1481. 2: 諸痔久不愈，必至穿穴為 漏矣 , “All cases of piles that do not heal over an extended period of time will develop holes and eventually turn into leakage ”. e) Identical with jiu lou 九 漏 , nine types of leakage. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 23: 凡項邊、腋下先作瘰癧者，欲作漏也 , “All cases that begin as scrofula pervasion-illness to the side of the nape or in the armpits may eventually turn into leakage ”.

②PI: the opening of leaking sores where pus is emitted. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 23: 搗生商陸 根，捻作餅子如錢大，厚三分，安漏上 , “Grind fresh shang lu root and knead into cookies the size of a coin three fen thick. Place on the leakage ”. ③ Illness Sign of long-term festering sores. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 21: 灸刺，則於瘡上漏膿水不歇，遂 至癰疽羸瘦而死 , “If this is cauterized or pierced, there will be unending leakage of pus and water from the top of the sores. This will result in obstruction-illness and impediment-illness, emaciation, and eventually death”.
